heroSection.name: Iris Auñón Navarro
heroSection.title: Systems technician and developer
heroSection.text: Junior systems technician with a fullstack development background, artificial intelligence and Big Data analytics. Currently seeking opportunities to apply my knowledge and adapt to different roles. Eager to keep learning and growing professionally.

cards.title: Web audit bot
cards.description: Basic website audit automation.

cards.title: Bluesky
cards.description: CLI program for basic Bluesky interaction.

cards.title: Video converter and audio extractor
cards.description: Easier video conversion and audio extraction through ffmpeg.

cards.title: Aquarium on Scratch
cards.description: Aquarium made on Scratch for CS50.

cards.title: Differences between two files
cards.description: GUI program built with Tkinter to check differences between two plain-text files.

cards.title: Seasons for Forza Horizon 4
cards.description: Web season tracker for Forza Horizon 4.

cards.title: Neighborhood cloner for The Sims 2
cards.description: GUI program built with Tkinter to clone any neighborhood in The Sims 2.

cards.title: Sample size and margin of error
cards.description: Sample size and margin of error calculator for data analysis, GUI built using Tkinter.

cards.title: Website
cards.description: Website with tic-tac-toe, calculator, number system converter and other pages.

cards.title: Fire risk prediction
cards.description: Final project for the AI and Big Data course. It predicts risk of fire in a specific locality using convolutional neural networks.

cards.title: Fuel price prediction in Spain
cards.description: Based on another project for the AI and Big Data course, but in this web version it uses FastAPI. It predicts fuel prices for every Spanish province based on monthly data.

cards.title: Automated job finder
cards.description: RPA project developed for the AI and Big Data course, featuring a robot designed to perform the following tasks: login, job searching based on specific criteria and automatic job application. Developed with BluePrism.

cards.title: Stadium ticket and event management
cards.description: Blockchain project for the AI and Big Data course. Visualizes stadium zones and manages ticket sales and zone bookings, developed with Solidity (Ethereum).

cards.title: Time alerts for Stardew Valley
cards.description: A Stardew Valley mod with SMAPI, displays in-game alerts at night.

futureProjects.title: Future projects
list: Upgrade and update of GitHub repositories
Development of graphical user interfaces with Python, C# or Lazarus (Pascal) for programs and tools such as image filtering and capture
Backend frameworks: hands-on practice using Flask, Django and Laravel
Implementation of algorithms and models, such as linear regression, for a better understanding of how they work

cards.title: CS50 - Introduction to computer science
cards.description: Algorithms, data structures and memory management with C. Python and SQL. Development of web pages with HTML/CSS, JavaScript and Flask.

cards.title: (IFCP0110) Website creation and publication (unofficial translation)
cards.description: Development of web pages with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Using libraries such as Bootstrap and jQuery, and platforms like WordPress.

cards.title: Data analytics Google Specialization
cards.description: Data cleaning and data analysis with R, data visualization with Tableau, SQL and spreadsheets.

cards.title: Google IT automation with Python Specialization
cards.description: Automation with Python and Bash, version control with Git and GitHub, regular expressions and unit tests.

cards.title: Artificial intelligence and big data specialization (unofficial translation)
cards.description: Big Data with Docker, Power BI, AWS/Azure, Hadoop, SQL, Nifi, Pentaho, MongoDB and Databricks. Artificial intelligence with Python and using libraries (scikit-learn, OpenCV, Tkinter, among others). Machine learning, neural networks and natural language processing. A little bit of C#. RPA with BluePrism and Blockchain with Solidity (Ethereum).

cards.title: Administration of networked computer systems (unofficial translation)
cards.description: Builds on the previous course by adding operating system administration (Windows, Linux) and network services, cybersecurity and databases. Web development with HTML/CSS, WordPress and Joomla!

cards.title: Microcomputer systems and networks (unofficial translation)
cards.description: Installation, maintenance and software configuration, hardware and networks. Use of office software (such as Word, Excel). Web development with HTML and CSS.

cards.title: WordPress developer
cards.description: Design, editing, and maintenance of websites built with WordPress using Divi builder and various plugins. Web audits to ensure functionality and site integrity.

cards.title: Private tutoring and PC repair
cards.description: Private tutoring in using phones and computers. Repair and setup of computers for individuals.

cards.title: Library assistant
cards.description: Assisting users at the front desk. Restocking and labeling of library materials.

cards.title: WordPress developer
cards.description: Development and management of a website built with WordPress.

cards.title: Computer technician
cards.description: Setup and maintenance of computers. Installation, maintenance and configuration of software and operating systems. Malware detection and removal.
